post:
Greetings folks!

Back with another domain auction

  1. FreeBSD (dot) help
    Expiry: 1st August 2020 / BIN: $50

  2. Hypervisors (dot) net
    Expiry: 23rd August 2020 / BIN: $100

  3. Hypervisors (dot) org
    Expiry: 26th August 2020 / BIN: $100

  4. NVRAM (dot) org
    Expiry: 24th August 2020 / BIN: $50

  5. Hyperthreading (dot) net
    Expiry: 24th August 2020 / BIN: $50

  6. Hyperthreading (dot) org
    Expiry: 26th August 2020 / BIN: $50

  7. Shellcodes (dot) net
    Expiry: 28th August 2020 / BIN: $50

All the domain names listed above are at Dynadot.

Rules:

  • The starting price for each domain name is $7, with a bid increment of $1 (minimum). This means, the first bidder will start bidding at $8.
  • Bid on the number and do not post/mention the domain name. (eg: #1 - $8)
  • During the auction period, should someone claim the BIN for any of these domain names at their respective BIN price, it will outbid any existing bids that has been placed thus ending the auction for the domain name instantly.

The domain(s) can be transferred via 2 methods:

  1. Pushed within Dynadot via Dynadot Forum Name.
  2. EPP/AUTH code will be provided to the winner should the winner chooses to have the domain name transferred out of Dynadot, to a different registrar. Winner takes the cost for the transfer.

Payment Method:
PayPal (Payment to be made within 24 hours from end of auction, be it BIN or bid. Winner covers PayPal fees, if any.)

Auction Ends:
Saturday, 2nd November 2019, 17:00 (CEST) - Countdown Timer
